reviewText: Even though Amazon does not sell this, you can find it with a quick Google search.  The class is for the intermediate adult ballet dancer and contains a full barre and center.  The dancers in the class have a range of abilities, so the class does not star purely professional ballet dancers. The teacher, Kat, is a formal professional ballet dance with a very pleasant and fun personality (the type of teacher who is always making dancers laugh at themselves).  She gives many corrections throughout the class and thus it is also a good teaching tool. The DVD is chaptered but does not contain a separate chapter for the instruction and then the exercises. All exercise are done on both sides.
